name: Cooking Mama: Mama's 2-Pack
overview: Mama serves up twice the motion-based fun! Cooking Mama: World Kitchen Mama gets a 3D makeover along with 50 new recipes including ginger pork and gelatin Customize your kitchen and fix mistakes in silly new kitchen mini-games Cooking Mama: Cook Off Use 300 ingredients to create 55 recipes, from hot dogs to pan fried crab Challenge a friend to the ultimate multiplayer cook off
